#include<stdio.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int weight[505];
int val[1000];
int maxi(int a, int b)
{
	if(a>b)
	return a;
	return b;
}
int main()
{
	while(1)
	{
		int w,n,i;
		memset(weight,0,sizeof(weight));
		memset(val,0,sizeof(val));
		scanf("%d %d",&w,&n);
		if(w==0&&n==0)
		break;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{	
			scanf("%d %d",&weight[i],&val[i]);
		}
		int knap[n+5][w+1],j;
		memset(knap,0,sizeof(knap));
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<=w;j++)
			{
				if(j==0||i==0)
					knap[i][j]=0;
				if(j<weight[i-1])
					knap[i][j]=knap[i-1][j];
				else
				{
					knap[i][j]=maxi(val[i-1]+knap[i-1][j-weight[i-1]],knap[i-1][j]);
				}
			
			}
		}
		int temp=0,max=-100;
		for(i=0;i<=w;i++)
		{
			if(knap[n][i]>max)
			{
				max=knap[n][i];
				temp=i;
			}
		}
		printf("%d %d\n",temp,knap[n][w]);
	}
return 0;
}
